# ANOVA

Extension of t-test for independent samples.

## One-way ANOVA

Use one variable => one-way.

```{r}
set.seed(123)

#create data frame
data <- data.frame(program = rep(c("A", "B", "C"), each = 30),
                   weight_loss = c(runif(30, 0, 3),
                                   runif(30, 0, 5),
                                   runif(30, 1, 7)))
boxplot(weight_loss ~ program, data = data)
mod <- aov(weight_loss ~ program, data = data)
summary(mod)
```
